title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 464.2 - Transmittal and filing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 464.2 - Transmittal and filing

State Regulations

Copies of all decisions and of all revisions thereof shall
be sent promptly to all parties. Copies of the board decisions shall be filed
in the department at a place designated by the commissioner and copies shall be
kept on file at the board offices. Such decisions shall be open to the public
for inspection, but without revealing the names or other identifying
information of any of the parties or witnesses involved. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
464.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
